label: Testing configuration
name: quantumLeap-testing
description: The testing configuration of the QuantumLeap framework.

settings.name: debug
settings.label: Show debug logs
settings.description: Display the logs in the terminal for debugging.

settings.label: Number of repetitions
settings.name: r
settings.description: The number of repetitions for each combination of parameters.

settings.label: Minimum number of templates
settings.name: minT
settings.description: The minimum number of training templates used for the training of the recognizers.

settings.label: Maximum number of templates
settings.name: maxT
settings.description: The maximum number of training templates used for the training of the recognizers.

settings.name: forceDifferentUsers
settings.label: Force different users
settings.description: Force the selection of training templates produced by different users than the one that produced the testing testing.

settings.label: Number of sampling points
settings.name: samplingPoints
settings.description: The number of points of the gesture after resampling.

settings.label: Points
settings.name: points
settings.description: The points that are used by the recognizers.

dynamic.name: modules
dynamic.label: Module(s)
dynamic.description: The dynamic gesture dataset loader(s) to use in the pipeline.

settings.name: datasets
settings.label: Dataset
settings.description: The dynamic gesture dataset to load.

settings.name: users
settings.label: User(s)
settings.description: The users that are used to train the recognizer(s), separated by a comma (","). Leave empty to select all users.

settings.name: id
settings.label: Identifier
settings.description: Unique identifier for the dataset (strongly recommended if multiple datasets are selected).

dynamic.name: aggregateClasses
dynamic.label: Gestures
dynamic.description: The gestures that are used to train the recognizer(s). All the gestures are used if none is selected.

dynamic.name: modules
dynamic.label: Module(s)
dynamic.description: The dynamic recognizers to use in the pipeline.

settings.name: useCustomParams
settings.label: Use custom parameters
settings.description: Override the global parameters and use the parameters of the recognizer instead.
